welcome_message_body: Welcome to Corozal, Puerto Rico! With its beautiful beaches, charming streets, and rich history, this city is sure to capture your heart. We invite you to explore and experience all that Corozal has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Isla Grande Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Isla Grande Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luis Munoz Marin International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Luis Munoz Marin International Airport, primarily serving regional and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arecibo Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Arecibo Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mercedita Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
